Text.text: To check that different types of Circle objects can be displayed correctly.
1. Check that you can see one green circle with a blue border and one red circle with a green border.
2. MOUSE ONLY: hover your mouse over the circles and observe that both of them change color.
3. Perform zoom in and zoom out on the map. Observe that the green circle changes its size as you zoom. Observe that the red circle doesn't change size.
